                                            <span>Question 1</span>

height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-72" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-73" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.151em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-74" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">4</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.324em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-76"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.137em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.77em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>{</mo><mtable columnalign="left left" rowspacing=".2em" columnspacing="1em" displaystyle="false"><mtr><mtd><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>20</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>16</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>83</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>21</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>140</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>288</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo fence="true" stretchy="true" symmetric="true"></mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-1">f\left(x\right)= \begin{cases} \frac{1-e^{3x-12}}{20\ln{(5-x)}} ; x≤4 \\ \frac{x^3-16x^2+83x+k}{x^3-21x^2+140x-288}; x>4 \end {cases}</script></span></p>

<p>যদি ফাংশনটির&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-77" style="width: 2.908em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.386em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1002.35em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-78"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-79" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-80" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-81" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.911em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">x=4 </script></span>&nbsp;বিন্দুতে লিমিটের অস্তিত্ব থাকে, তবে উক্ত লিমিট এবং k&nbsp;এর মান নির্ণয় কর।</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>20</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>20</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-82" style="width: 13.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.863em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1010.86em, 2.871em, -999.998em); <p>ধরি,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>h</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-154" style="width: 8.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.641em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1006.6em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-155"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-156" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-158" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-159" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-160" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-161" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-162" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-163" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-164" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>h</mi><mo>∴</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-4">4-x=h\therefore x\rightarrow4 </script></span>&nbsp;হলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-165" style="width: 2.666em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>h</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>20</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>h</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>h</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>h</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>20</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>h</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>h</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>h</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>20</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-170" style="width: 19.1em; <p>লিমিটের অস্তিত্ব থাকবার জন্য,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>16</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>83</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>21</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>140</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>288</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>20</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-267" style="width: 10.781em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>16</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>83</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>140</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="width: 19.674em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.109em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1015.86em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-381"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-383" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-387" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.117em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1002.67em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-388"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-389"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-390" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 2.707em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-393" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">83</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-399" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">140</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>16</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>83</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>140</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">\therefore4^3-{16\times4}^2+83\times4+k=0\Rightarrow k=-140\ </script></span>&nbsp;[Ans.]</p>

<p><b>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</b></p>

<p><b><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>20</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>20</mn></mfrac><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="width: 8.199em; </script></span>&nbsp;</b>নির্ণয়ের জন্য&nbsp; ০৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>140</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-446" style="width: 4.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.404em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.36em, 2.215em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-447"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-448" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">140</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>140</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">k=-140</script></span>;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য&nbsp;০৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p><strong>বি.দ্রঃ&nbsp;</strong>যুক্তিসংগত যে কোনো নিয়ম গ্রহণযোগ্য।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div><div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2</span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>{</mo><mtable columnalign=&quot;left left&quot;   x≤5   \\   \frac{\cos{(2x-10)}-\cos(3x-15)}{60\left(x-5\right)^2};  x>5  \end{cases}</script></span>&nbsp;যদি ফাংশনটির&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>25</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>60</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>60</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>120</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>24</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\underset{x \to 5}{\lim} \frac{\cos{(2x-10)}-\cos(3x-15)}{60\left(x-5\right)^2} = \underset{x \to 5}{\lim}  \frac{2\sin{\left(\frac{5x-25}{2}\right)}\sin{\left(\frac{x-5}{2}\right)}}{60\left(x-5\right)^2} \\
= \underset{x \to 5}{\lim} \frac{2\sin{\left\{\frac{5}{2}\left(x-5\right)\right\}}\sin{\left\{\frac{1}{2}\left(x-5\right)\right\}}}{60\times\frac{5}{2}\left(x-5\right)\times\frac{1}{2}(x-5)}\times\frac{5}{2}\times\frac{1}{2}=\frac{5}{120}=\frac{1}{24}</script></span></p>

<p>এখন,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>31</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>24</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>24</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-259" style="width: 21.6em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-332" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-333" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.7em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 5.699em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-335" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">24</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.402em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>31</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>24</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>24</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-4">\underset{x \to 5}{\lim} \frac{x^2-px+20}{x^3-10x^2+31x-30}=\frac{1}{24}\Rightarrow \underset{x \to 5}{\lim}  \frac{x^2-px+20}{\left(x-5\right)\left(x-2\right)\left(x-3\right)}=\frac{1}{24}</script></span></p>

<p>এখানে, লিমিট তখনই থাকবে যদি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>20</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-338" style="width: 6.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.084em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1005em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-339"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-341"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-342" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-343" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-345" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-346" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-347" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">20</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>20</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">(x^2-px+20) </script></span>&nbsp;রাশিটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="width: 3.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.42em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-351"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-353" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-356" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <p>তখন,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>p</mi><mn>.5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>45</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-357" style="width: 16.273em; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-361" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-362" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-363" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">p</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-365" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-366" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-371" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-372" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi><mn>.5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>45</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">5^2-p.5+20=0\Rightarrow5p=45\therefore p=9\ </script></span>&nbsp;[Ans.]</p>

<p><b><u>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</u></b></p>

<p><b><u><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mo form=&quot;prefix&quot;>lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>60</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>24</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="width: 12.379em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">24</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><munder><mo form="prefix">lim</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>60</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>24</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\underset{x \to 5}{\lim} \frac{\cos{\left(2x-10\right)}-\cos{\left(3x-15\right)}}{60\left(x-5\right)^2} = \frac{1}{24}</script></span>;&nbsp;</u></b>নির্ণয়ের জন্য&nbsp;&nbsp;০৫নম্বর।</p>

<p>p = 9;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য&nbsp;০৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p><b><u>বি দ্রঃ</u></b> যুক্তিসংগত যে কোনো নিয়ম গ্রহণযোগ্য</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div><div class="row questionBlock">
                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3</span>
                                            
                                        </div>

-999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1728"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1729" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: id="MathJax-Span-1731" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: id="MathJax-Span-1748" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1749" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1751" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1752" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1757" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1758" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≠</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1759" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 12.625em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -12.997em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 14.303em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>14</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>72</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>162</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>42</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>144</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>162</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>12</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>144</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>;</mo><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>24</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\frac{dy}{dx}=\frac{1}{12}\left(4x^3-14\times3x^2+72\times2x-162\right)=0 \\
\Rightarrow4x^3-42x^2+144x-162=0\Rightarrow\left(x-3\right)^2\ (2x-9)=0 \\
\therefore x=3\ ;\ x=\frac{9}{2} 
\frac{d^2y}{dx^2}=\frac{1}{12}({12x}^2-84x+144) \\
f^{\prime\prime}\left(3\right)=0; \\ \ f^{\prime\prime}\left(\frac{9}{2}\right)=\frac{3}{4} \\
\therefore\frac{d^3y}{dx^3}=\frac{1}{12}(24x-84) \\
f^{\prime\prime\prime}\left(3\right)=-1\neq0 
</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1760" style="width: 3.404em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.789em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.436em, 1002.75em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1761"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1762" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1763" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1764" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1765" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-46">\therefore x=3 </script></span>&nbsp;বিন্দুটি Point of inflection.</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1766" style="width: 2.666em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1767"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1768" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1769" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1770" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1771" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1772" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-47"> x=\frac{9}{2} </script></span>&nbsp;এ লঘু মান থাকবে।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1773" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1774"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1775" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">\therefore </script></span>&nbsp;লঘুমান&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-49-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>729</mn><mn>64</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1776" style="width: 7.01em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.74em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1005.74em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1777"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1778" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1779" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1780" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1781" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1782"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1783" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1784" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1785" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1786" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1789" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">729</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1790" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">64</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>729</mn><mn>64</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-49">=f\left(\frac{9}{2}\right)=-\frac{729}{64}</script></span></p>

<p>ফাংশনটিতে গুরুমান নেই।</p>













                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div><div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>যদি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mi>t</mi></mfrac></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-452" style="width: 3.69em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.02em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.12em, 1003.02em, 2.349em, -999.998em); class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>m</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>m</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>m</mi></msup><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>m</mi></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>m</mi></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>m</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>y</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">t=e^{m\ ln\ x}=e^{\ln{x^m}}=x^m \therefore x=e^\frac{y}{x^m}\Rightarrow\ln{x}=\frac{y}{x^m}\\ \Rightarrow y=x^m\ln{x} \therefore y_1=mx^{m-1}\ln{x}+x^{m-1}\\ \Rightarrow xy_1=mx^m\ln{x}+x^m\Rightarrow xy_1=my+x^m\Rightarrow x^m=xy_1-my </script></span></p>

<p>আবার,&nbsp;</p>

stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>m</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">y_2=m\left(m-1\right)x^{m-2}\ln{x}+mx^{m-2}+\left(m-1\right)x^{m-2} \\ \Rightarrow x^2y_2=m\left(m-1\right)x^m\ln{x}+\left(2m-1\right)x^m \\ \Rightarrow x^2y_2=m\left(m-1\right)y+\left(2m-1\right)\left(xy_1-my\right) \\ \Rightarrow2xy_2+x^2y_3=m\left(m-1\right)y_1+\left(2m-1\right)\left(y_1+xy_2-my_1\right) \\ \Rightarrow2xy_2+x^2y_3=m^2y_1-my_1+2my_1+2mxy_2-2m^2y_1-y_1-xy_2+my_1 \\ \Rightarrow2xy_2+x^2y_3=-m^2y_1+2my_1-y_1+2mxy_2-xy_2 \\ \therefore x^2y_3+2xy_2+y_1\left(1-m\right)^2+xy_2\left(1-2m\right)=0 </script></span></p>

<p><b>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</b></p>

<p><b><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>m</mi></msup><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-974" style="width: 4.879em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.977em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.94em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-975"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-976" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-977" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-978" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-980" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">ln</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-982"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-983" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-984"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-985" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mi>m</mi></msup><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">y=x^m\ln{x} </script></span>&nbsp;</b>নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>m</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>m</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-986" style="width: 10.412em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>m</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>m</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>m</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1013" style="width: 21.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.912em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1017.91em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1014"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1015"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1016" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1017" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1022"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1058"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1059"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1060" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1061" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1062" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>m</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>m</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>m</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">y_2=m\left(m-1\right)x^{m-2}\ln{x}+mx^{m-2}+\left(m-1\right)x^{m-2} </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1063" style="width: 24.428em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>m</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1115" style="width: 19.469em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1119" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1120"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1122" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1144"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1145" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1146" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1147" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1149"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1151" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1152" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1153" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1156" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>m</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">x^2y_3+2xy_2+y_1\left(1-m\right)^2+xy_2\left(1-2m\right)=0 </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p><strong>বি:দ্রঃ&nbsp;</strong>যুক্তিসংগত যে কোনো নিয়ম গ্রহনযোগ্য।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div><div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>10 মিটারের একটি লম্বা সুতাকে কেটে দুইভাগ করা হল। একটি অংশ দিয়ে একটি বর্গ তৈরি করা হল এবং অপর অংশ দিয়ে একটি বৃত্ত তৈরি করা হল। কর্তিত সুতার অংশদ্বয়ের প্রত্যেকের দৈর্ঘ্য কত হলে এদের দ্বারা সৃষ্ট ক্ষেত্রের যোগফল সর্বনিম্ন বা সর্বোচ্চ হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>ধরি, 1: k অনুপাত সুতাটিকে কাটা হয়।</p>

<p>তাহলে একটি অংশের দৈর্ঘ্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1157" style="width: 1.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1001.36em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1158"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1159"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.27em, 4.182em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1164" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1175" style="width: 1.682em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>k</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1194" style="width: 2.625em; top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1195"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1196" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1197" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.27em, 4.182em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1204" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>k</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1205" style="width: 4.018em; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1209"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1210" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1211" style="font-size: 70.7%; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1222" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1223"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;মোট ক্ষেত্রফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>k</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>100</mn><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>π</mi><mfrac><mrow><mn>200</mn><mi>k</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>π</mi><mfrac><mrow><mn>100</mn><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">\therefore\frac{dA}{dk}=\frac{100}{16}\left(-2\right)\frac{1}{\left(1+k\right)^3}+\pi\frac{200k}{4\pi^2\left(1+k\right)^2}+\pi\frac{100k^2}{4\pi^2\left(1+k\right)^3}\left(-2\right)=0 </script></span></p>

font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1415" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1416" style="font-size: 70.7%;
