font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1421" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1422" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1423" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1424" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1425" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1426"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1427" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1428" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1002.87em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.441em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.432em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1429"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1430" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1431" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1432"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.133em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1001.76em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1433"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1434" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1435"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1436" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1437" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1438" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1439" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.342em; left: 1.805em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1440" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1008.4em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 8.404em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.452em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>k</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>25</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>50</mn><mi>k</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>50</mn><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>25</mn><mi>π</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>50</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>100</mn><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">\Rightarrow\frac{dA}{dk}=-\frac{25}{2\left(1+k\right)^3}+\frac{50k}{\pi\left(1+k\right)^2}-\frac{50k^2}{\pi\left(1+k\right)^3}=0\Rightarrow\frac{-25\pi+50k\times2\left(k+1\right)-100k^2}{2\pi\left(k+1\right)^3}=0 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1443" style="width: 4.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.732em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1003.69em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1444"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1445" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1446" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; <p><b>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</b></p>

<p>একটি অংশ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1462" style="width: 1.928em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>100</mn><mrow><mn>16</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mfrac><mrow><mn>100</mn><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1481" style="width: 10.699em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.773em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1008.77em, 2.871em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1492"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1493" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1494" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1495" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1496" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.342em; left: 1.805em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1497" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.953em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1498" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1499" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1500"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.363em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.72em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.859em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1501"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1502" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1503"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1504" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1505" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1003.24em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.441em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.596em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1506"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1507" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1508"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1509" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.219em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1510" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1511"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.133em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1001.76em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1512"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1513" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1514"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1515" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1516" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1517" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1518" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.342em; left: 1.805em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1519" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.36em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.363em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>100</mn><mrow><mn>16</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>π</mi><mfrac><mrow><mn>100</mn><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">A=\frac{100}{16\left(1+k\right)^2}+\pi\frac{100k^2}{4\pi^2\left(1+k\right)^2}</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>k</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1520" style="width: 3.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.584em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.54em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1521"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1522"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1523"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1524" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1525" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1526"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1527" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1528" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>k</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">\frac{dA}{dk}=0 </script></span>&nbsp;ব্যবহার করে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1531" style="width: 2.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.17em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1532"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1533" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1534" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1535" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1536" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1537" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-41">k=\frac{\pi}{4} </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p>একটি অংশ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>5.6</mn><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1538" style="width: 3.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.625em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1002.58em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1539"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5.6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1542" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>5.6</mn><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">=5.6m </script></span>&nbsp;এবং অপর অংশ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>4.4</mn><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1543" style="width: 3.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.625em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.58em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1544"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1546" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4.4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1547" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>4.4</mn><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">=4.4m </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p><strong>বি:দ্রঃ&nbsp;</strong>যুক্তিসংগত যে কোনো নিয়ম গ্রহনযোগ্য। একক না লিখলে বা লিখে ভুল করলে ০১ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>y</mi></mfrac></msqrt></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-429" style="width: 7.193em; 0.207em;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-750"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-753" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-754" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-755" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-756" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-757" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-758" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-759" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-760" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">v</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-761" 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 11.682em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -11.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 13.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>y</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>y</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>y</mi></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>b</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>b</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>b</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>v</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>d</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">x=\frac{1}{2}\ln{\left(\frac{a+bx}{y}\right)}\Rightarrow2x=\ln{\left(\frac{a+bx}{y}\right)}\Rightarrow e^{2x}=\frac{a+bx}{y} \\
\Rightarrow y=\left(a+bx\right)e^{-2x}\\
\Rightarrow y_1=-2\left(a+bx\right)e^{-2x}+be^{-2x}\Rightarrow y_1=-2ae^{-2x}-2bxe^{-2x}+be^{-2x} \\
\Rightarrow y_2=4ae^{-2x}-2be^{-2x}+4bxe^{-2x}-2be^{-2x} \\
\Rightarrow y_2=\left(8ae^{-2x}+8bxe^{-2x}-4be^{-2x}\right)-4ae^{-2x}-4bxe^{-2x} \\
\Rightarrow y_2=-4y_1-4y\Rightarrow y_2+4y_1+4y=0 \\
\therefore y_3+4y_2+4y_1=0\ (proved) 
</script></span></p>

<p><b>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</b></p>

<p><b><u><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-764" style="width: 7.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.232em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1005.99em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-765"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-766" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-768" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-769" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-770"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-771" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-772" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-773" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-774" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-776" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-777" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-778"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-779"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-780" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-781" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-782" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-783" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">y=\left(a+bx\right)e^{-2x}\  </script></span></u>&nbsp;</b>নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০২&nbsp;নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-784" style="width: 14.1em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-821" style="width: 7.953em; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">y_3+4y_2+4y_1=0 </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p><strong>বি:দ্রঃ </strong>যুক্তিসংগত যে কোনো নিয়ম গ্রহনযোগ্য।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2264;</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1229" style="width: 21.798em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.579em, 1000.41em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.395em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1263" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.649em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.52em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 0.523em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1265" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.312em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.452em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.548em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">f\left(x\right)=1+2\sin{x}+3\cos^2{x};\left(0\le x\le\frac{\pi}{2}\right) </script></span>&nbsp;ফাংশনটির বৃহত্তম ও ক্ষুদ্রতম মানের পার্থক্য কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>f</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1266" style="width: 31.355em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1326" style="width: 7.912em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.83em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-38">\sin{x}=\frac{1}{3}\therefore x=\sin^{-1}{\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)}=\cos^{-1}{\left(\frac{2\sqrt2}{3}\right)}</script></span></p>

xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>x</mi></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>16</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">f^{\prime\prime}\left(x\right)=-2\sin{x}-6\cos^2{x}+6\sin^2{x} \\
f^{\prime\prime}\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)=-2+6=4,\ \ f^{\prime\prime}\left(\sin^{-1}{\frac{1}{3}}\right)=-\frac{2}{3}-6\left(\frac{2\sqrt2}{3}\right)^2+6\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)^2=-\frac{16}{3} 
</script></span></p>

ক্ষুদ্রতম মান&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1534" style="width: 5.33em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">=f\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)=3</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1546" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1547"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1548" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণেয় পার্থক্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>13</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1549" style="width: 5.945em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.879em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.88em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1550"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1551" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1552" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1553" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">13</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1554" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1558" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1559" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1560" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>13</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">=\frac{13}{3}-3=\frac{4}{3}</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>f</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1561" style="width: 2.42em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.89em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1562"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1563"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1565" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">′</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1566" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1567" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1568" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1569" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>f</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">f^\prime\left(x\right)  </script></span>&nbsp;ব্যবহার করে x&nbsp; এর মান নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৩ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-46">f^{\prime\prime}\left(\frac{\pi}{2}\right)=4 </script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1609" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1610" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1611" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1612"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1613" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1614" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>16</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-47">f^{\prime\prime}\left(\sin^{-1}{\frac{1}{3}}\right)=-\frac{16}{3}</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৩ নম্বর।</p>

<p>সর্বোচ্চ এবং সর্বনিম্ন মানের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p>পার্থক্য বের করার জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p><strong>বি:দ্রঃ</strong>&nbsp;যুক্তিসংগত যে কোনো নিয়ম গ্রহনযোগ্য।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Physics (7)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 1</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>L&nbsp;দৈর্ঘ্যের একটি স্প্রিংকে এমনভাবে ভাগ করা হল যেন একটি অংশের দৈর্ঘ্য অপরটির n গুণ হয়। আদি স্প্রিং এর বল ধ্রুবক&nbsp;নির্ণয় কর।&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>আমরা জানি,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>k</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>l</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1615" style="width: 2.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1002.13em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1616"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1617" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1618" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1619" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1620" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1621" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>k</mi><mo>∝</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>l</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">k\propto\frac{1}{l}</script></span></p>

<p>ধরি, অংশদ্বয়ের দৈর্ঘ্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-49-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1622" style="width: 0.781em; <p>তাহলে,&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>n</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1642" style="width: 5.412em; <p>এখন,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi>n</mi></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>n</mi></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1663" style="width: 21.559em; top: -2.826em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1664"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1665"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1667" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1672" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>n</mi></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>k</mi><mi>n</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1716" style="width: 12.912em; <p>অনুরূপভাবে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-55-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1742" style="width: 5.904em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1746" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1747" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1748" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>n</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1754" style="width: 5.412em;
