width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1763" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1764" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1765"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1766" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.207em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1767" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1768"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1769" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.207em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1770" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1772" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1773" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1774" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>n</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-56">\frac{k_1}{k_2}=\frac{l_2}{l_1}=\frac{1}{n}</script></span>;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>k</mi><mi>n</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1775" style="width: 6.15em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.043em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.96em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1776"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1777"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1778" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1779" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1780" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1781" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1782" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1783" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1784" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1785" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1786" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1787" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1788" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>k</mi><mi>n</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">k_1=\frac{k}{n}(n+1) </script></span>;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1789" style="width: 5.904em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.838em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1004.76em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1790"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1791"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1792" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1793" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1795" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1796" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1797" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1798" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1799" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">k_2=k(n+1) </script></span>;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>2.5&nbsp;m&nbsp;দীর্ঘ একটি ইস্পাতের সুষম তারের ভর&nbsp;16&nbsp;g&nbsp;এবং ঘনত্ব&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>7800</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2050" style="width: 6.224em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.106em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1005.11em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2051"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2052" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">7800</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2053" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2054" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2055" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2056"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.865em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.86em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2057" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.896em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2058"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2059"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2060" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2061" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>7800</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">7800\ kgm^{-3}</script></span>&nbsp;80&nbsp;N&nbsp;বলে টান দিলে তারটির দৈর্ঘ্য প্রসারণ হয়&nbsp;1.2&nbsp;mm&nbsp;। ঐ তারের উপাদানের ইয়ং-গুণাঙ্ক এবং তারে সঞ্চিত স্থিতিশক্তি নির্ণয় কর।</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>এখানে, তারের দৈর্ঘ্য,&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2062" style="width: 4.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.65em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.61em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2063"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2064" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2065" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2066" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2067" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2068" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-59">L=2.5\ m</script></span></p>

<p>বল,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>80</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2069" style="width: 4.264em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.49em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2070"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2071" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2072" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2073" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">80</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2074" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2075" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>80</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-60">F=80\ N </script></span></p>

<p>দৈর্ঘ্য প্রসারণ,&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2076" style="width: 11.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.715em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1009.67em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2077"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2078" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2079" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2080" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2081" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2082" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2083" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2084" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2085" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2086" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2087" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2091"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2092"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2093" style="font-size: 70.7%; <p>তারের ভর,&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2097" style="width: 10.781em; <p>তারের ঘনত্ব,&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7800</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2118" style="width: 6.969em; <p>তারের প্রস্থচ্ছেদের ক্ষেত্রফল,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mi>L</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2.05</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>2.5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>8.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2168" style="width: 15.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.543em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1012.54em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2169"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2170" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2171" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1003.2em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.596em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2177"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2178" style="font-size: 70.7%; <p>আমরা জানি, ইয়ং এর গুণাঙ্ক,&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>80</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2204" style="width: 11.518em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2.033</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2243" style="width: 9.551em; <p>আবার, সঞ্চিত স্থিতিশক্তি,&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>Y</mi><mi>A</mi><msup><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>L</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2.033</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>8.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mn>2.5</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2264" style="width: 21.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.379em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.494em, 1017.38em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2265"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2266" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1011.31em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 11.314em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>Y</mi><mi>A</mi><msup><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>L</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2.033</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>8.2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1.2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mn>2.5</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-68">W=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{YAl^2}{L}=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{2.033\times{10}^{11}\times8.2\times{10}^{-7}\times\left(1.2\times{10}^{-3}\right)^2}{2.5} </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2325" style="width: 8.732em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1007.13em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2326"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2327" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2328" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2331" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2332" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2333"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2334"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2336"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2337"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2338" style="font-size: 70.7%; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">\therefore W=4.8\times{10}^{-2}\ J</script></span>&nbsp;[Ans.]</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2342" style="width: 8.117em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.033</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2360" style="width: 10.33em; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.033</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2365" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2366" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2370"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2371"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2372" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">11</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2373" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2374" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2375"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2376" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2377"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2378"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2379" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2380" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>J</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2381" style="width: 8.035em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.559em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1006.31em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2382"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2383" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2387" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2391"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2392"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2393" style="font-size: 70.7%; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>J</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">W=4.8\times{10}^{-2}\ J\ </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p>[<strong>বি.দ্রঃ </strong>একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div><div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো তারের দৈর্ঘ্য&nbsp;5&nbsp;m&nbsp;ও ব্যাসার্ধ&nbsp;&nbsp;1cm&nbsp;এবং ভর&nbsp;100&nbsp;kg;&nbsp;তারের উপাদানের ইয়ং এর গুণাঙ্ক&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1837" style="width: 7.975em;                                     </div>
                                </div>

width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.436em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -5.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 6.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>ℓ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi>ℓ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>ℓ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>ρ</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>ℓ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>ρ</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mi>Y</mi></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>y</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi>ℓ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>ρ</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mi>Y</mi></mfrac><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>L</mi></mrow></msubsup><mi>y</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mi>ℓ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>ρ</mi><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mfrac><mi>m</mi><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi>g</mi><msup><mi>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-54">\ell=\frac{FL}{AY}\ ;\ell=\frac{mgL}{AY}\ ;d\ell=\frac{\left(\rho Ay\right)g\ dy}{AY}\therefore d\ell=\frac{\rho g}{Y}\ ydy \\
\ell=\frac{\rho g}{Y}\int_{0}^{L}ydy  \\
\therefore\ell=\frac{\rho gL^2}{2Y} =\frac{\frac{m}{AL}gL^2}{2Y}=\frac{mgL}{2AY} 
</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-55-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x2113;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>100</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1971" style="width: 18.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.838em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1014.59em, 3.076em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1972"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1973" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">ℓ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1976" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -1.719em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1977"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1978" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1979" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1980" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1981" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1982" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1006.68em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.441em; left: 50%; margin-left: -3.359em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1983"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1984" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1985" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1986" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1987" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1988"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1001.72em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1989"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1990" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1991" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.01</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1992" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.342em; left: 1.805em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1993" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1994" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1995" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1996" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1997"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1998"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1999"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2000" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2001"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2002"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2003" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">11</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1006.8em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 6.805em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2004" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2005" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2006" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2007" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3.9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2008" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2009" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2010"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2011"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2013"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2014"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2015" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2016" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2018" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>ℓ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>100</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-55">\therefore\ell=\frac{100\times9.8\times5}{2\times\pi\times\left(0.01\right)^2\times2\times{10}^{11}}\ m=3.9\times{10}^{-5}\ m\ </script></span>&nbsp;[Ans.]</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x2113;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2020" style="width: 3.609em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.953em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1002.95em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2021"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">ℓ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2023" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2024" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.559em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.44em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.736em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2025"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2026" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2027" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2028" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.44em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2029"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2030" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2031" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2032" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.56em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.559em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>ℓ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-56">\ell=\frac{mgL}{2AY}  </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p>মান বসানোর জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x2113;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2033" style="width: 7.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.232em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1005.99em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2034"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2035" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">ℓ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2036" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2037" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3.9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2038" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2039" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2040"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2041"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2042" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2043"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2044"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2045" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2046" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2047" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2048" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2049" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>ℓ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">\ell = 3.9\times{10}^{-5}\ m\ </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p>[<strong>বি.দ্রঃ </strong>একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কাটা যাবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি মান বসালেও সূত্রের জন্য বরাদ্দকৃত নম্বর পাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি তারের দৈর্ঘ্যের অর্ধেক অংশ তামা ও বাকী অর্ধেক অংশ লোহা দিয়ে তৈরী। তারটির ইয়ং এর গুণাঙ্ক নির্ণয় কর। [তামা ও লোহার ইয়ং এর গুণাঙ্ক যথাক্রমে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>12.6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1801" style="width: 9.205em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1802"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1803" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">12.6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1818" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>20</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1819" style="width: 8.273em; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1824"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1825"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1826" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mi>Y</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62">\Rightarrow\frac{FL}{AY}=\frac{F_1L_1}{AY_1}+\frac{F_2L_2}{AY_2}\Rightarrow\frac{L_1+L_2}{Y}=\frac{L_1}{Y_1}+\frac{L_2}{Y_2} [F=F_1=F_2, </script></span>&nbsp;তারের উপর বল সমভাবে প্রযুক্ত]</p>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">20</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1004.88em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.416em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1981"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1982"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1983" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1984"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1985" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">12.6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1986" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1987" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">20</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1988" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1989" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1990"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1991"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1992"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1993" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1994"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1995"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1996" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.37em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 5.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1998" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">15.46</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1999" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2000" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2001"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2002"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2004"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2005"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2006" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2007" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2008"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2009" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2010"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2011"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2012" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2013" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mi>Y</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>12.6</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>20</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>12.6</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>15.46</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\Rightarrow\frac{2}{Y}=\frac{1}{Y_1}+\frac{1}{Y_2}\Rightarrow Y=\frac{2Y_1Y_2}{Y_1+Y_2}=\frac{2\times12.6\times20\times{10}^{20}}{\left(12.6+20\right)\times{10}^{10}}=15.46\times{10}^{10}Nm^{-2} </script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mi>Y</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2014" style="width: 7.379em; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.9em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mi>Y</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>Y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">\frac{L_1+L_2}{Y}=\frac{L_1}{Y_1}+\frac{L_2}{Y_2}</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>15.46</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2042" style="width: 10.084em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.24em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1008.24em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2043"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2044" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.166em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2045" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2046" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">15.46</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2047" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2048" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2049"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2050"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2051" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2052"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2053"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2054" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2055" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2056"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;
