width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2058"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2059"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2060" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2061" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>15.46</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">Y = 15.46\times{10}^{10}Nm^{-2} </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৬ নম্বর।</p>

<p>[<strong>বি.দ্রঃ </strong>একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div><div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>200&nbsp;gm&nbsp;ভরের একটি বস্তু সরল ছন্দিত গতিতে গতিশীল। মধ্যাবস্থান হতে বস্তুটির যখন&nbsp;0.15&nbsp;m&nbsp;সরণ হয়, তখন এর উপর ক্রিয়ারত প্রত্যায়নী বলের মান&nbsp;0.3N&nbsp;। গতির দোলনকাল নির্ণয় কর।</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>এখানে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>200</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.15</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mo>;</mo><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2398" style="width: 19.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.986em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1015.99em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2399"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2400" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">200</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2404" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2405" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2407" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2408" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2409" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2410" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2411" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2412" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2414" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.15</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2416" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2418" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2420" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2421" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2422" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>200</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>g</mi><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.15</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mo>;</mo><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.3</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">m=200\ gm=0.2\ kg ; x=0.15\ m ; F=0.3\ N</script></span></p>

<p>ধরা যাক, স্পন্দনের বল ধ্রুবক&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2423" style="width: 1.6em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.31em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2424"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2425" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2426" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-74">=k</script></span></p>

<p>সরণ&nbsp;= x</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2427" style="width: 0.658em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2430" style="width: 3.199em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2473" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2474" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2475" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2476"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.1em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1003.08em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2477"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2478"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.83em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.67em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.35em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2479"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2480" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2481" style="font-size: 70.7%; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.83em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 3.117em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 2.42em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.412em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.904em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.395em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.887em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2484" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2485" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.98</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2486" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2487" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.402em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msqrt><mfrac><mi>m</mi><mi>k</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>k</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mi>F</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.15</mn></mrow><mn>0.3</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>1.98</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">T=2\pi\ \sqrt{\frac{m}{k}} =2\pi\ \sqrt{\frac{mx}{kx}}=2\pi\ \sqrt{\frac{mx}{F}}=2\pi\ \sqrt{\frac{0.2\times0.15}{0.3}}=1.98\ s </script></span>&nbsp;[Ans.]</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p>মান বসানোর জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.98</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>s</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2514" style="width: 4.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.936em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.69em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2515"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2516" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">T<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2517" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2518" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.98</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2519" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2520" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.98</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>s</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-80">T = 1.98\ s\ </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p>[<strong>বি.দ্রঃ </strong>একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কাটা যাবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি মান বসালেও সূত্রের জন্য বরাদ্দকৃত নম্বর পাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সেকেন্ড দোলকের দৈর্ঘ্য 1% বৃদ্ধি করলে উক্ত দোলক দিনে যে সময় হারাবে, তা নির্ণয় কর।</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2136" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">428.79</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2137" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>86400</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>86400</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>86400</mn><mrow><mn>86400</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1.01</mn><mn>1</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>428.79</mn><mi>s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-67">T_2=\frac{2\times86400}{86400-n}\therefore\frac{T_2}{T_1}=\frac{86400}{86400-n}=\left(\frac{1.01}{1}\right)^\frac{1}{2}\Rightarrow n=428.79s</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2138" style="width: 5.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.469em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.371em, 1004.47em, 2.789em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2139"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2140"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; top: -3.891em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2143" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2148" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.035em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.875em; left: 2.338em;"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2159"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2161" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.37em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-68">\frac{T_2}{T_1}=\left(\frac{L_2}{L_1}\right)^\frac{1}{2}</script></span>&nbsp;সূত্রের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p>মান বসানোর জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>428.79</mn><mi>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2162" style="width: 5.207em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.264em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1004.22em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2163"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2164" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2165" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2166" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">428.79</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2167" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>428.79</mn><mi>s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">n=428.79s </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p>[<strong>বি.দ্রঃ </strong>একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কাটা যাবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি মান বসালেও সূত্রের জন্য বরাদ্দকৃত নম্বর পাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div><div class="row questionBlock">
                            <div class="row question">

                        </div><div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Chemistry (5)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">

                                            <span>Question 1</span>

                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>9.6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5.6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2277" style="width: 22.051em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.076em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1018.08em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2278"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2279" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2280" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2281" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2282"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2283" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">9.6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2285" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;  V_2=\left(6.85\times{10}^{-4}-x\times2\times{10}^{-5}\right)m^3\ ,\ \ T_2=\left(30+273\right)K=303K </script></span></p>

<p>আমরা জানি,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2399" style="width: 5.084em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-81-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>140</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5.6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>343</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>178.332</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>6.85</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mn>303</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>14.83</mn><mo>&amp;#x2248;</mo><mn>15</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2424" style="width: 26.559em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2469"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2470"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2471" style="font-size: 50%; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1010.66em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2476" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2477" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2478" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">14.83</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2479" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≈</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2480" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">15</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>140</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5.6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>343</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>178.332</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>6.85</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mn>303</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>14.83</mn><mo>≈</mo><mn>15</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-81">\Rightarrow\frac{140\times5.6\times{10}^{-4}}{343}=\frac{178.332\times\left(6.85\times{10}^{-4}-x\times2\times{10}^{-5}\right)}{303}\Rightarrow x=14.83\approx15</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>15</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2481" style="width: 1.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.436em, 1001.56em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2482"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2483" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2484" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">15</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mn>15</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\therefore15 </script></span>&nbsp;টি মার্বেল সরিয়ে ফেলা হয়েছিল।</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-83-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2485" style="width: 5.084em; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">T<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">T<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.6em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-83">\frac{P_1V_1}{T_1}=\frac{P_2V_2}{T_2} </script></span>&nbsp;সূত্রের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p>মান বসানোর জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>14.83</mn><mo>&amp;#x2248;</mo><mn>15</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2510" style="width: 6.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.371em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1005.33em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2511"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2512" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2513" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2514" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">14.83</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2515" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≈</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2516" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">15</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>14.83</mn><mo>≈</mo><mn>15</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">x=14.83\approx15 </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p>[<strong>বি.দ্রঃ </strong>একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কাটা যাবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি মান বসালেও সূত্রের জন্য বরাদ্দকৃত নম্বর পাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2</span>

width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2549" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">CO_2 </script></span>&nbsp;এর মোল সংখ্যা এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2551"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2552"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>পাত্রের আয়তন,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mi>p</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>12</mn><mn>44</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.082</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>300</mn></mrow><mn>1</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6.7</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2555" style="width: 14.797em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6.7</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.082</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>300</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6.7</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.082</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>303</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2.7</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2580" style="width: 22.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.404em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1018.36em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2581"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2582" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2583" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2585"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2586"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2592" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2593" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2594" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2595" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.363em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.76em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2596"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2597" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.082</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2612" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2613" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2614" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2616" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2617" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2618"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2619"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2621"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2622"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2623" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2624" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2625" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2626" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2627" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2628" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6.7</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.082</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>300</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6.7</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.082</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>303</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2.7</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-87">\therefore\left(n_2-n_1\right)=\frac{6.7\times1}{0.082\times300}-\frac{6.7\times1}{0.082\times303}=2.7\times{10}^{-3}\ mol </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2629" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2630"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2631" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;অক্সিজেনের পরমাণু সংখ্যা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2.7</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>6.023</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>23</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3.25</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>21</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2632" style="width: 19.715em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.15em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1016.15em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2633"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2634" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2635" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2636" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2637" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2638"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2639"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2640" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2641"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2642"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2643" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2644" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2645" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2646" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2647" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2648" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6.023</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2649" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2650" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2651"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2652"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2653" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2654"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2655"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2656" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">23</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2657" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2658" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3.25</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2660" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2661"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2662"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2663" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2664"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2665"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2666" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">21</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>2.7</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>6.023</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>23</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3.25</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>21</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-89">=2.7\times{10}^{-3}\times2\times6.023\times{10}^{23}=3.25\times{10}^{21} </script></span>&nbsp;টি।</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6.7</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2667" style="width: 4.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.53em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2668"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2669" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6.7</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2672" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2673" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6.7</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">V=6.7\ L </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2.7</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2674" style="width: 11.764em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.633em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1009.59em, 2.379em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2681" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2683" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2685" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2690" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2691"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2692"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2694"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2695"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2696" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2.7</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">\left(n_2-n_1\right)=2.7\times{10}^{-3}\ mol </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৩ নম্বর।</p>

<p>অক্সিজেনের পরমাণু সংখ্যা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>3.25</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>21</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2702" style="width: 5.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.756em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.76em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2703"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3.25</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2706" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2707" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2708"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2709"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2711"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2712"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2713" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">21</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>3.25</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>21</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">=3.25\times{10}^{21} </script></span>&nbsp;টি&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৩ নম্বর।</p>

<p>[<strong>বি.দ্রঃ </strong>একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>50</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>k</mi><mi>P</mi><mi>a</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2517" style="width: 3.728em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.057em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1003.02em, 2.386em, -999.998em); height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>50</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>k</mi><mi>P</mi><mi>a</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">50\ kPa </script></span>&nbsp;চাপে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi>o</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>P</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>x</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></msqrt><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi>C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi>o</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>x</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>P</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.0821</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>369</mn><mo>×</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>4.484</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>×</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.49</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>44.05</mn><mo>≈</mo><mn>44</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>u</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-89">P=\frac{50}{101.325}=0.493\ atm \\
C_{o_2}=\sqrt{\frac{3RT}{M_1}}=\sqrt{\frac{3PV}{nM_1}}\ \ ;\ \ C_x=\sqrt{\frac{3RT}{M_2}}\ \\  
\therefore C_{o_2}=C_x\Rightarrow\frac{3PV}{nM_1}=\frac{3RT}{M_2}\\
\Rightarrow M_2=\frac{0.0821\times369\times\ 4.484\times{10}^{-3}\ \times32}{0.49\times0.2}=44.05\approx44\ amu\ 
</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2693" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2694"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2695" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;গ্যাসটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2696" style="width: 1.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.6em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2697"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2698" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2699"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2700" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2701" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">CO_2</script></span>&nbsp;হতে পারে।</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>P</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2702" style="width: 4.961em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.059em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.06em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2703"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2704"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.559em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.44em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2705"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2706" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2708" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.39em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2709"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2710" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2714" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2715" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2716"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2717" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2718" style="font-size: 70.7%;
