overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2722" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.52em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>P</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>R</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">\frac{3PV}{nM_1}=\frac{3RT}{M_2}</script></span>&nbsp;সূত্রের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p>মান বসানোর জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>44.05</mn><mo>&amp;#x2248;</mo><mn>44</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>u</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2723" style="width: 9.879em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.076em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1007.83em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2724"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2725"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.07em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2726" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">M<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2727" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2728" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2729" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">44.05</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≈</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">44</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2733" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2734" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2735" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">u</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2736" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>44.05</mn><mo>≈</mo><mn>44</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>u</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">M_2=44.05\approx44\ amu\  </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।&nbsp;</p>

<p>গ্যাসটি&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2737" style="width: 1.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.6em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2738"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2739" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2740"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2741" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2742" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-94">CO_2 </script></span>&nbsp;হতে পারে উল্লেখ করার জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p>[<strong>বি.দ্রঃ </strong>একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কাটা যাবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি মান বসালেও সূত্রের জন্য বরাদ্দকৃত নম্বর পাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div><div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>2m&nbsp;দৈর্ঘ্যের ও&nbsp;8cm&nbsp;ব্যাসের একটি সিলিন্ডারের এক প্রান্ত থেকে অন্য প্রান্তে যেতে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2714" style="width: 1.567em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.27em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2715"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2716"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.9em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2717" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2718" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.093em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">H_2 </script></span>&nbsp;গ্যাসের&nbsp;36&nbsp;sec&nbsp;সময় লাগে। অন্যদিকে 4 m&nbsp;দৈর্ঘ্যের ও 4 cm&nbsp;ব্যাসের একটি সিলিন্ডারের এক প্রান্ত থেকে অন্য প্রান্তে যেতে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2719" style="width: 1.827em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2831" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2832" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">35.8</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2833" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2834" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2835" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2836" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">u</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.448em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></msqrt><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.04</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>36</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.02</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mn>107.27</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></msqrt><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>35.8</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>u</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-100">\frac{\frac{v_1}{t_1}}{\frac{v_2}{t_2}}=\sqrt{\frac{M_2}{M_1}}\Rightarrow\frac{\frac{\pi\times\left(0.04\right)^2\times2}{36}}{\frac{\pi\times\left(0.02\right)^2\times4}{107.27}}=\sqrt{\frac{M_2}{M_1}}\Rightarrow M _2=35.8\ amu</script></span></p>

<p>ধরি,&nbsp;Cl-35&nbsp;এর পরিমাণ x&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2837" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2838"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2839" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-101">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;Cl-37&nbsp;এর পরিমাণ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2840" style="width: 2.256em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1001.8em, 2.215em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2841"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2842" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2843" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2844" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-102">1-x</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>35</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>37</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>35.8</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>35</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>37</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>0.6</mn><mn>0.4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2845" style="width: 26.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 21.477em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1021.44em, 2.789em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2846"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2847" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2848" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2849" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2850" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">35</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2852" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">37</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2853" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2855"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2856" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2857" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2858" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2859" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2860" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2861" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">35.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2863" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2864" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2865" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.6</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2867" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2868" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.133em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.97em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.982em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2869"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2870" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2871" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2872" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.01em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.982em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2874"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2875" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2876" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2877" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2878" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">37</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.13em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.133em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2879" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2880" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2881" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2882" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2883" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2884" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>35</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>37</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>35.8</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>35</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>37</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>0.6</mn><mn>0.4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-103">\therefore x\times35+37\left(1-x\right)=35.8\Rightarrow x=0.6\ \therefore\frac{Cl-35}{Cl-37}=\frac{0.6}{0.4}=1.5</script></span>&nbsp; [Ans.]</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-104-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>35.8</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>u</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2885" style="width: 6.764em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-105-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2896" style="width: 3.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.83em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1002.58em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2897"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2898" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2900" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.6</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-105">x=0.6\  </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০৪ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-106-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>35</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>37</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2902" style="width: 5.248em; <p>[<strong>বি.দ্রঃ</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০১ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div><div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>লুইস তত্ত্বানুসারে যৌগ/আয়নসমূহের অম্ল-ক্ষার ধর্ম ব্যাখ্যা কর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi>O</mi><mi>H</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>b</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi><mi>O</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>c</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>+</mo><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>d</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>e</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi>S</mi><mi>i</mi><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2743" style="width: 6.112em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.994em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(7.044em, 1004.99em, 14.16em, -999.998em); top: -7.897em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2744"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.994em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.132em, 1004.99em, 4.361em, -999.998em); overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2749"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2752" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2753" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">H<span style="display: inline-block; <p><b>(b)&nbsp;</b>CO&nbsp;অণু ক্ষেত্রে :&nbsp;CO&nbsp;অণুতে নিঃসঙ্গ ইলেকট্রন জোড় বর্তমান থাকায় এটির পক্ষে ইলেকট্রন জোড় দান সম্ভব।এ কারণে&nbsp;CO&nbsp;লুইস ক্ষার।<!--[if gte msEquation 12]><m:oMath><span
 style='font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Cambria Math",serif;
 mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:
 "Times New Roman";mso-bidi-theme-font:minor-bidi;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;
 mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA'><m:r><m:rPr><m:scr m:val="roman"/><m:sty
    m:val="p"/></m:rPr> </m:r></span></m:oMath><![endif]--></p>

<p><b>(c) </b>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>+</mo><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2823" style="width: 2.461em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.465em; left: 1.273em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2841"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2842"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2843" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>+</mo><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-100">{\rm Cu}^{++} </script></span>&nbsp;আয়ন ইলেকট্রন গ্রহণ করতে পারে । তাই&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>+</mo><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2845" style="width: 2.461em; <p><b>(d) </b>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2856" style="width: 2.174em;   </m:r></span></m:oMath><![endif]--></p>

<p><b>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</b></p>

<p>লুইস তত্ত্বানুসারে যৌগ / আয়নসমূহের অম্ল-ক্ষার ধর্ম ব্যাখ্যার জন্য (২ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-109-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2909" style="width: 0.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1000.49em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2910"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2911" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.703em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>×</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-109">\times</script></span>&nbsp;৫) = ১০ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>

            </div>

    
</div>
